# alloy-utils

> Alloy utility library

## Installation

```bash
npm i alloy-utils
```

## Usage

```js
const {
  utils, // Utility functions
  logger, // Alloy logger
  constants, // Constants used in Alloy
  platforms, // Platform information
  tiapp, // Utils to work with tiapp.xml
  tssGrammar // TSS grammar defintion
} = require('alloy-utils');
```
